s.text: I am writing this letter with due respect and heartful of tears since we have not known or meet ourselves previously I am asking for your assistance after I have gone through a profile that speaks good of you.
I will be waiting to hear from you.
I will be waiting to hear from you.
I will be waiting to hear from you.
I will be waiting to hear from you.
I will be waiting to hear from you.
I will be waiting to hear from you.
I will be waiting to hear from you.
I will be waiting to hear from you.
I would like to use this opportunity to introduce myself to you.
Please I am asking you to stand on my behalf as my partner to claim the Money out from the financier company and transfer it into your position.

The main reason why I am contacting you now is to seek your assistance in the area of my future investment and also to help me to transfer Money that he deposited in financier company over to your possession.
I am a daughter of late Mr. Jeremiah Otomeh, My father Mr. Jeremiah.E.
I am a daughter of late Mr. Jeremiah Otomeh, My father Mr. Jeremiah.E.
I am a daughter of late Mr. Jeremiah Otomeh, My father Mr. Jeremiah.E.
I am a daughter of late Mr. Jeremiah Otomeh, My father Mr. Jeremiah.E.

Otomeh was a politician and international business man, before the rebels attacked our house one early morning killing my mother and my father It was only me that is alive now, and After the death of my parents , I was rescued by United Nation who brought me to Dakar Senegal where I am residing in as a refugee.

Otomeh was a politician and international business man, before the rebels attacked our house one early morning killing my mother and my father It was only me that is alive now, and After the death of my parents , I was rescued by United Nation who brought me to Dakar Senegal where I am residing in as a refugee.

Otomeh was a politician and international business man, before the rebels attacked our house one early morning killing my mother and my father It was only me that is alive now, and After the death of my parents , I was rescued by United Nation who brought me to Dakar Senegal where I am residing in as a refugee.

Otomeh was a politician and international business man, before the rebels attacked our house one early morning killing my mother and my father It was only me that is alive now, and After the death of my parents , I was rescued by United Nation who brought me to Dakar Senegal where I am residing in as a refugee.
I have the deposit certificate to back up this and other papers I shall then provide you with more details and relevant documents that will help you understand the transaction for you to help me.

The main reason why I am contacting you now is to seek your assistance in the area of my future investment and also to help me to transfer Money that he deposited in financier company over to your possession.
I have the deposit certificate to back up this and other papers I shall then provide you with more details and relevant documents that will help you understand the transaction for you to help me.
I want to find out if it's possible for you to deal with individual as to investment.
Date: Sat, 27 Nov 2010 22:05:30 -0800 (PST) From: otomeh deborah <deborah1987@att.net> Reply-To: deborah1star@yahoo.co.uk Subject: please stand as my trustee To: undisclosed recipients: ;
